snippet: Last year, Amazon was responsible for the city’s biggest deal and its largest lease, and an anticipated height rezoning has attracted other potential investors.
abstract: Amazon is responsible for Seattle's biggest real estate deal of the year and its largest lease for1.8-million-square-foot headquarters; anticipated height rezoning with project has attracted other potential investors.
lead_paragraph: Last year, Amazon was responsible for the city’s biggest deal and its largest lease, and an anticipated height rezoning has attracted other potential investors.

headline.seo: Amazon Drives Upsurge in Seattle Office Market Activity
